special_text:
[+1]: Draw a card for each different mana value among spells you’ve cast this turn.
[-X]: Exile another target nonland permanent with mana value X or less. You create a colorless Saga enchantment token with time loop and  “{r}{3}– You may cast a copy of the exiled card without paying its mana cost.” [i](Remove all lore counters after {r}{3} without sacrificing the Saga.)[/i]
[-8]: Starting with you, each player takes an extra turn after this one. You gain control of each opponent during that player’s next turn.
